member.name: ITfThreadMgrEventSink.OnInitDocumentMgr
member.summary: Called when the first context is added to the context stack
member.param: Pointer to the document manager object.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ITfThreadMgrEventSink.OnPopContext
member.summary: Called when a context is removed from the context stack
member.param: Pointer to the context removed from the stack.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ITfThreadMgrEventSink.OnPushContext
member.summary: Called when a context is added to the context stack
member.param: Pointer to the context added to the stack.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ITfThreadMgrEventSink.OnSetFocus
member.summary: Called when a document view receives or loses the focus
member.param: Pointer to the document manager receiving the input focus. If no document is receiving the focus, this will be NULL.
Pointer to the document manager that previously had the input focus. If no document had the focus, this will be NULL.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ITfThreadMgrEventSink.OnUninitDocumentMgr
member.summary: Called when the last context is removed from the context stack
member.param: Pointer to the document manager object.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ITfThreadMgrEventSink
member.summary: The ITfThreadMgrEventSink interface is implemented by an application or TSF text service to receive notifications of certain thread manager events. Call the TSF manager with IID_ITfThreadMgrEventSink to install this advise sink.
